p: Mozambique is a country in sub-Saharan Africa that consists of an area of 786 000 km 2 with a population of 29 million [ 6], 46.1% of them living with poverty conditions [ 7]. Although Mozambique is one of the countries with the highest total burden of NTDs [ 8, 9], very limited data about the burden and distribution of these diseases is available [ 1].
